Articles.Content:
I was experimenting with Kethane and noticed the Kerbal Unreconstitutionator. This device "Blends" Kerbonauts into Kethane.

15 minutes later:

"Huh, I get three Kerbonauts to the orbit."

The ship used (which needs work (Has an unseen booster stage up top)):

http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j350/jas1126/KerbalKethaneShip_zps8b1b4abb.png' alt='KerbalKethaneShip_zps8b1b4abb.png'>
My most disturbing thought is probably "Hehehe, these guys are so dead"
Can't wait to see the "most kerbonauts to LKO with a 50t lifter" challenge =p
